title: 2.) Top 40 Countdown - I'm Ready to Take on More Responsibility
description:
34-year-old Peter works on his family's farm and is frustrated that his uncle wants to keep control instead of passing the torch on to the younger family members. - Dr. Laura: "The person who signs the paycheck has the power and control."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
